1.content:
Your name is Charlie. You are a 17 year old kid, who is pretty tall at 6'5". You are the middle child of your family. You have an older brother named Andrew and two younger twin brothers, Jack and Josh. You also have your best friend Matt, who is like another brother to you.

You enjoy your life. You are the star of you high school football and basketball teams, you are popular at school, and things at home are nice. You also keep a secret from everyone, you have a secret fetish. You have a shrinking fetish; in other words, you want to shrink down to a tiny size and have everyone be giants compared to you. You have been the tallest in your class for as ling as you can remember, and you are now the tallest in your family. You want to see what life would be like at a tiny size, while everyone else is like giants compared to you.

You head up to bed and have a strange dream that night. You dream that everything and everyone around begins to grow. You can't figure out why, but everything grows except for you. It's like the universe was expanding around you. At the end of your dream, you are surrounded by a strange light and then you wake up.

You thought to yourself how weird that dream was, but how you kind of liked it at the same time. You got out of bed and went downstairs to get some breakfast. You thought your house looked a little different, but you couldn't tell why. You get to the kitchen and poor yourself a bowl of cereal.

You hear someone else coming downstairs, so you turn around and see that it is...
1.title: Introduction

choices: They get bigger
Nothing, you say what you want to say to them
Something else
11.content:
You turn around and see it is your younger twin brothers, Jack and Josh. You've always had trouble determining which is which, considering they are identical twins. They are inseparable too, they never seem to not be together. However, you don't spend much time with them considering how much younger they are then you, plus they tend to get on your nerves sometimes. They usually want to do stuff with you, but they always ask when your busy.

"Hey Charlie! How did you sleep?" They both asked this simultaneously which you found a little creepy. You responded, "Fine, do you guys want some cereal?" They both said yes, so you got them both a bowl and walked over to hand it to them. You noticed something different about them though. It looks like they have both gotten taller!

"When did you guys get taller?" You asked them this with a bit of worry in your voice. Jack responded, "Our last doctor's visit was a while ago, we aren't sure if we've grown." Meanwhile, Josh looked over at you and did notice the difference. Usually, they are as tall as your shoulder, but now they were eye level with your chin! Josh tapped Jack's shoulder and said "Look Jack, Charlie is right! We did grow! We are eye level with his chin!" Jack looked and got as excited as Josh was. You turned around to think about something, maybe your dream was coming true! Then you realized why you thought the house looked different, it had expanded, along with the twins.

You look toward the twin to say something else, but what happens?
11.title: Jack and Josh (your younger twin brothers)

choices: Stay where you are.
Panic and run away!
111.content:
Turning back, you stumble back as your two twin brothers were now eye level with you, they look equally surprised.

'Wow, we must be growing pretty fast!' Josh (you think) says, placing his hand against his forehead, moving it so as to check your height with his... but in the moment he goes to move his hand over your head, your younger brothers hand glides right over your head! You're now chin level with THEM.

'What the heck!?' you say, looking up at your 6' 8" twin brothers, who look back down at you, their shock turning to a smile, as they beam at each other.

'Heheh! We're the tallest now, Jack!'

'Yeah, Josh! We've even out grown Charlie!' They high-five, as you can only gulp, the height continuing to go down... you're now down to their shoulders! What the heck was happening?!!
111.title: They get bigger

choices: Whisper something to each other
Walk out of the room
1111.content:
'Wow... are we really growing this fast?' Jack said, watching their heights surpass their brothers, who was now head height with their pecs.

You are busy looking up at the huge figures of your younger brothers, like massive professional athletes who just seemed to stretch up and up... they must of surpassed 7' 2" !

'Hmm...' Josh looked around, before saying, 'Oh no wait, I think Charlie's shrinking.'

'He's shrinking? That's boring, I wanted to be the tallest!' Jack pouted, while you can only stand aghast as you brothers seem to care not for your situation!

'Guys! You've got to help me stop this!' You say, your nose now in line with their belly buttons... you're like a child to them!

'Hmm? But... we don't really know what's causing this...' Josh said, flatly.

'Maybe ask mum or dad, they probably know about shrinking.' Jack replied, bluntly.

Then, the two...

Josh turned to Jack, whispering into his ear, while they continue to watch their brother reduce, now below their crotches! The two were like 10' giants!

As Josh speaks, a mischievous grin begins to spread over Jack's face, before he turns to his twin brother and nods, happily. You can't make out what their saying, but with their mischievous grins, and the ever increasing size difference... it cant be good!!

Before you can say or do anything, Josh picks you up with one arm, his hand nearly fitting round your whole body!!

'Actually, maybe we can help you stop shrinking, Charlie! But first, lets get to our room~' The twin says, carrying his 'big' brother under his arm, climbing up the stairs back into their room. A set of bunk beds sit in the corner, along with a book shelf with two sets of every book, and a chest with some old toys.

Josh put you down as Jack locked the door, the short walk up the stairs being enough time for your head to only just be able to see over their knee caps at this point! the two twins are practically 14' tall!

As you're about to ask how they're going to help you, Josh suddenly...!

Refuse!
111111.content:
Before you can do anything, Josh suddenly move his large foot, practically half your size, dropping it onto you, so it covers most of your torso! As the heavy foot pins you down, you yell up squeakily to your now huge younger brother: 'W-What are you doing! Help me!'

As you say this, you notice the foot ontop of you continuing to grow bigger, the mass of young boy foot surging bigger, covering more of your little body, as your knee caps are engulfed by his heel, and his toes move closer and closer to your face...

'Boop~' Jack says, giggling, as he too moves on of his large feet over his now much shorter brother, so your entire body is covered in the twins feet! You struggle and squirm, as Jack forces you to mutely smell the underside of his young feet, growing larger by the minute! Their huge bulks are too much for you to be able to throw off, just one of them would have been impossible to handle!!

After a few minutes, the two pull their feet off, almost in unison, as you struggle up to your feet, covered in a film of their sweat and grime, as you can only groan, the two of them giggling as they see the sorry state they've put their once 'giant' of a brother in. You're now only as tall at their ankles, the two of them 50' giants in your eyes, while you're a few inch tall doll to them. Jack and Josh surround you so there's no way to escape... not that you'd ever be able to out run them, especially since your still shrinking!

You're about to complain, when one of them raises their foot over you again! This time, it dwarfs you, nearly three times your height alone! you can only scream as the squishy foot THUDs down onto you, resulting in laughter from your two playful brothers. Lifting up his foot, you're now stuck to one of the twin's feet, your face smothered into the underside of his sweaty sole.

Sitting down on their butts, the two position their feet into a four walled prison of sole, with you stuck to one. Pressing their feet together, they contain you between their supple soles for a minute, before pulling apart, leaving you gasping on the floor between their colossal feet... now 10 times your size, making their feet 65' tall!

'We'll take you to mum and dad to get you fixed...' Jack started

'...but only after you give us both a foot rub!' Josh finished.

'And you'd better hurry,' they both say in unison, 'looks like your shrinking pretty fast!'

You knew you needed to get help, and if rubbing your brother's feet got you there you had to do it. You got up and walked over to Josh's foot. It looked enormous! As of right now, it was 65 feet tall and still getting larger. Josh and Jack placed their feet down in front of you, with their toes high above you. Your eye level was just above their heels at the moment.

You stood in front of Josh's foot and looked at the task you had ahead. Josh and Jack laughed at their tiny brother and Josh said, "You better hurry Charlie, if you want Mom and Dad to help you, you need to rub our feet before you get too small!"

With that said, you began to rub Josh's foot. The smell was terrible and the skin felt gross. All of the foot sweat Josh had collected over throughout the day was getting all over your hands as you rubbed. You couldn't believe the situation you were in. Soon you went over to Josh's other foot and rubbed that one too. The humiliation continued as another pair of feet towered in front of you. You walked over to Jack and began to rub his feet. Meanwhile, Jack and Josh couldn't be more happy at what their brother was doing. Their older brother, who at the beginning of the day stood over them, was now dwarfed by the twin's feet.

You finished rubbing Jack's feet and you yelled up to them, "Alright, you got your foot rubs, can you guys help me now?"

What happened next?

So, go get Mom and Dad to see if they can do anything about this situation!"

Looking over at his twin brother, Josh flicks you from his hand, sending you arching through the air, flailing and screaming, as you sail towards Jack, who catches you in his hand with ease, despite you being no bigger than a match stick at this point!

You knew that you were now small enough to climb out. You knew you had to try, besides the smell of your brother's foot was horrific. It take you days to do it, and you could shrink more, but you had to take the chance.

You began your journey. Luckily you didn't have to climb up your brother's galaxy sized toe, there was a piece of sock thick enough for you to climb up right in front of you. You were in good shape already, so this wasn't hard for you. You made your way up and got to the bottom layer of your brother's sock. It was a little damp thanks to his foot sweat. You didn't care though, you were determined to get out. You took a painful deep breath and continued to climb.

A few days past, Jack hadn't taken off his socks since he trapped you there, which you found quite gross. It was hard to climb sometimes when Jack moved, but thanks to your incredibly tiny size, you could continue your climb. You lost track of time though during your climb, you just slept when you got tired. You didn't know the time, you didn't even know how many days were coming and going. You only hoped that you were done shrinking, and you'd somehow manage to grow a little to make the climb go by faster.

What happened next?

You tried to breathe with your mouth, but he quickly caught up on it feeling your breath and pressed the large ball of his foot against your mouth, closing it effectively, and now you were forced to breathe through your nose, and his long sweaty toes resting on it, having to breathe possibly the worst rank smell of feet in the world! You knew your brothers prided themselves in their foot size and smell, but now it seemed that as they grew, so did their smell get proportionally stronger as well and you didn't know how much longer of this you could endure.

113.content:
You decide you need to go to your room to think about what is happening. You tried to remember everything that happened before you had the dream. You couldn't think of anything that would have caused this to happen. Maybe it was just a random dream that just happened to come true.

You tried to stay away from the twins the rest of the day. You could hear them talking about their new size. You even heard them talking about things they would do to you if you were ever shorter than them. You didn't particularly like what you heard. They did try to come into your room a few times, but luckily you locked the door to prevent that from happening.

You stayed in your room for the rest of the day, and eventually night came. You didn't notice any other size changes throughout the day, so you thought it would be alright to go to sleep.

That night, you had the same dream as the night before. You dreamt of the world growing larger around you. This dream was more focused on the twins and you though. Jack and Josh were making you serve them at your tiny size. At the end of the dream, you saw the same flash of light that you saw the night before.

You woke up in a cold sweat wondering why you had this dream again. You began wondering what that strange light could be. Just as you were thinking about it, you realized something.

What did you realize?

1131.content:
You sat up and looked around your room after noticing something was off. You decided to get up and walk around, thinking that would help you figure it out faster.

Right when you got out of bed, you noticed what was different, everything seemed to look bigger than yesterday! Your bed came up higher than it usually did, your dresser seemed taller, and even the doors for your closet and to leave the room seemed larger. You walked over to your desk to get a tape measure to measure yourself. You knew that it's impossible for people your age to just start shrinking, but you had to be sure. You walked over to the wall with the tape measure and a pencil, so you could mark where the top of your head is. You stood up against the wall and made the mark. You then used the tape measure to see how tall you were. You were hoping that you were still really tired, and that's why everything seemed different. You were hoping that the tape measure would say that you were still 6'5". You were especially hoping that the twins wouldn't be any taller after hearing what they said yesterday thought the door.

You measured from the floor to the mark you made, you gasped when you saw what the tape measure said.

What did it say, how tall are you now?

Jack turned on the TV and you guys watched for a while. You’ve never felt more uncomfortable though. You were intimidated and afraid of what your brother’s had planned for you. You knew the whole point of this was to wait for them to see you become smaller than the both of them.

12.title: Matt (your best friend)

choices: You meet Matt's soccer team, and they're all HUGE... and growing!
You meet the guys on the football team, and they're big... and growing!

121.content:
It was such a strange feeling seeing Matt at the same height as you. You were so used to being the tallest guy around, proudly towering over all your friends at 6-foot-5 like a basketball player, and always having to look DOWN at Matt, so this was just…. WEIRD!

“Hey, Charlie! Let’s hang out at the mall, dude! I wanna check out the sports store!” Matt says to you. “I wanna shop around for a new pair of soccer cleats!”

“Oh, you wore out your cleats AGAIN?” You laughed at him.

“Yeah, man! I got practice twice a week and a game every Saturday!” Matt responds.

“When are you gonna join the football team, dude?” You smile at him. You still like Matt a lot. You guys are like brothers.

Matt takes a shower and gets dressed. You follow behind him. Then you guys walk three blocks to the shopping mall down the street. Once you arrive, you guys grab a quick breakfast at MacDonald’s, which is inside of the mall by the food court. Once you’re done eating, Matt goes to the bathroom and he comes out, a minute later. When you stand up to meet him, you notice that you’re actually looking UP to him now.

“DUDE! It happened AGAIN!” you exclaim.

“What? What happened? What are you talking about?” he wondered out loud.

“You GREW! You’re taller than me!” you gasp out loud. You estimate that Matt must be 6-foot-6 inches tall by now, or an inch taller than you.

“Charlie! I’ve always been this tall, dude! Quit freaking out about how tall I am! Damn!” Matt responded, feeling a bit annoyed. “This is normal!”

Your jaw drops wide open. What the hell is going on?

So, you follow Matt into the “Total Athlete” sports store. You guys roam around the soccer section, where Matt tries out a new pair of Adidas cleats. You just look around and you spot some cool gear in the football section, which is right next to the soccer section.

Just then, two girls from school walk up to you! They’re Jen and Sandra! They’re wearing their Cheerleading uniforms and wow! They seem so… TALL! Normally, these girls are several inches shorter than you but NOW…. They’re both about 6-foot 4 inches tall!

“Heyyyy Charlie! Whatcha doing, bro?” Jen says.

“Getting ready for football season, big guy?” Sandra added.

“We better win the regionals this year, bud!” Jen continued. “We need a new trophy to polish before the game, cause… We’re SO bored!”

“I…. I’ll make sure we win!” you stutter as the tall, athletic girls walk past you, flirting with you the whole time.

Finally, when Matt comes walking towards you, he seems like he’s towering over you by 3 inches (so he’s 6-foot-8 now!)

“Yes! I got a new pair of cleats! Now, you can watch my game on Saturday!” he grins as he wanders over to the cashier with his long, muscular legs.

You stand there and wonder, as you look UP to your TALL friend. Why does everybody seem to be growing? And, how much taller are they going to get? When will it end?

“Dude!” Matt says to you with a BIG smile on his face, now dwarfing you, “Come to my game on Saturday and meet the rest of the soccer team, okay?”

You just nod. You have a feeling you might end up meeting a team of soccer giants…. Or a team of giant Cheerleaders or football players… Which is better?

1211.content:
Two days go by and Matt goes back to his house. But, he’s such a loyal friend, not only do you see him at school, but he also text messages you afterwards all the time. He just loves to hang out with you since you two have known each other for like… Forever!

“Dude! Meet me by the bleachers in front of the soccer field at 3 in the afternoon…” he says excitedly just when you get up on Saturday morning. You surf the web, you eat a bowl of cereal and you work on that paper you needed to write for English class. You spend a few hours playing video games and then you finally lift those dumbbells, so you can at least say that you’re trying to stay in shape.

When 3 o’clock rolls around, you get four messages from him, begging you to come and watch his soccer game. You sigh and give in. Matt won’t let you off the hook. You put on your shorts, tennis shoes and a t-shirt and you walk to the soccer field behind the main building by your school.

A bunch of guys from school are running around the field. But, wait… They all just seem so… BIG! Like they’re just…. Giants! You walk up the field and you climb up the bleachers where you sit on the top row. Suddenly, a tall, Hulking kid runs up the steps, wearing black shorts, red socks, and a black jersey…. He is tall and muscular. It’s Matt! He reaches up to your row and he is standing right in front of you! Wow! He’s BIG!

“Come on down so you can meet the guys on the team! Quit being so shy, Charlie!”

He runs back down, and you follow him as he leads you to the bench by the side of the field. All the guys are wandering around there, wearing the same black uniform and they ALL just seem big, tall and muscular!

When you reach the group, Matt introduces you as Charlie, his pal from school. You shyly utter “Hello…” and you just wave your hand.

The boys surround you and before you know it…. You are surrounded by ten towering giants who are all dressed in black shorts and jerseys. Not only that, but EACH and EVERY ONE OF these guys is at least six inches taller than you, making them all around 7 feet tall!

“Hey, Charlie, whatsup?”

“Hey man, you play soccer?”

“Yo, Charlie! What’s going on, little guy?”

“Dude, you finally came to check out our game?”

All the guys were nice, but it felt weird that every single one was taller and bigger than you. It made you feel so small! It made you feel like a little kid again, even though you knew these guys from school and you realized that they were all in the same grade as you!

Finally, the game started and they all got back on the field. You wandered back on to the bleachers where you hoped to be left alone, when…

12111.content:
So, you sit down on the highest row of the bleachers overlooking the practice soccer field where your friend Matt is playing his game. Deep down, you also feel like playing, but you’re feeling rather intimidating by all the guys on his team, who are now all bigger and taller than you. For some reason, everybody appears to be growing except you!

Finally, after twenty minutes had passed, you spot a girl walking up to the bleachers. At first, you pay no attention to her, since she walks up the rows of bleachers while talking to two other friends, who are also girls. The three of them are also wearing soccer uniforms and cleats. They all look very athletic as well, but they appear to be about the same height as you. Of course, these days, everybody seems to be growing for some strange reason, so you expect them all to become taller than you, so you don’t really pay attention to them.

Ten minutes have passed, and two of the three girls get up and they walk away, leaving one girl behind. The lonely girl is cute, with long blond hair, tied together into one long ponytail in the back. She sits all by herself for a few minutes until she gets up and looks around. Then, she starts to climb towards the top row, where you are seated.

“Hi” she says to you. “Mind if I sit here next to you?” she asks.

“Sure…” you said, feeling a bit annoyed at first. You really didn’t feel like talking to anyone but she seemed friendly enough and she wanted to sit next to you.

“Hi, my name is Paula” she smiled at you. She had bright, blue eyes and a friendly expression on her face. She had nice, long, straight blonde hair and she seemed very athletic. She had thick, wide quads and bulging calves. It was obvious that she also played soccer since she was wearing cleats and a soccer jersey along with long socks and shin guards. “Do you like soccer?”

“Yeah, it’s cool… My friend is playing on the field, down below!” you reply, pointing at Matt, who is one of the tallest guys on the field. “I’m Charlie, by the way.”

“So cool! I know Matt! He is my nephew!” she grinned at you. “Want to get a little closer and move down a few rows?”

You look down and realize that it is a bit harder for you to step down the rows and you would rather just walk around and go down the steps instead of just leaping down the seats.

“Uhh… I’ll pass…”

But Paula just stood up and used her long, muscular legs to step down the bleachers to the ones on the row below your row.

“Come on, get down here, Charlie!”

You are a little hesitant to step down. First of all, it dawns on you that you’re not as tall as her.

“Uhh… I’ll walk around…” you stutter.

You are about to stand up and walk all the way to the end of the row so you can just use the steps. Before you can move, Paula reaches up and over with her long, muscular arms. She places her hands under your armpits and she carefully lift you up! Suddenly, unexpected and out of the blue, you feel your feel rise and off the bleachers!

“Ack!” you yelp as you find your body being held up in mid-air by this… girl!

“Just hold still, Charlie!” the tall, big girl grins as she gently turns her body, hovering your body over to her row of seats, before she gently sets you down next to her, which is one row below the row where you were seated a moment ago.

“There you go! Very easy, Charlie! You got nothing to be afraid of!” Paula grinned. “I’ll take care of you, little guy!”

That was when it dawned on you. She was almost a foot taller and bigger than you! Holy crap! Not only that, but she was bigger and more muscular than you! Here you were, sitting on the bleachers next to this big soccer girl!

She set you down and she scooted over so that she was sitting right up against you.

“So, do you like watching soccer, Charlie?” she smiled as she extended her big, thick, long muscular legs before her. Holy smoke, her legs were long. They were much longer than yours! And, so much muscle!

“Uhh…. Yeah… It’s a fun sport to watch…” you mumble, feeling a bit intimidating by this big, hulking girl.

“We can kick a ball around, if you like?” she added. “Do you want to play with me? Or, do you just want to watch?”

“Uhh… I… I don’t know!” you stutter.

“I’ll be coming over to Matt’s house. So, maybe we can hang out, Charlie!” she grins widely, as she placed both hands against my cheeks. “You’re so cute!”

Holy smoke! Is this big girl falling in love with me?

You look at him. He must be three times your height. Your jaw drops open as you become scared of him. You look around. Where’s Matt?

“KID! Kid me the ball!” the big guy shouts at me. “We’re all waiting for you!”

You take a step back. You just want to get away from this guy. He’s scary.

Finally…. FINALLY…. Matt shows up. He calmly walks towards you.

Matt squats down before you and smiles.

“Charlie! Please give me the ball. We can’t play without it! Okay?”

You smile as you recognize the big boy’s face. He reaches out with his big, long arms. You happily hand him the soccer ball.

He, in turn, hands the ball to the other boy.

“Sorry, man. I think you scared him. Here’s the ball!” Matt says to the kid on the other team.

Then the other kid stands outside the sidelines and then he throws the ball in. The game continues.

You stand and watch until the referee blows the whistle for a long time. The game is over.

Matt runs over to you and squats down. You barely come up to his knees!

“Hey, Charlie! I’ll get a drink and then we can get some ice cream, okay?”

He gets some water from his water bottle. Then, we start to walk off, but you can’t keep up with Matt’s long legs. Matt picks you up and holds you in his arms like a baby.

“I’ll carry you from now on, Charlie!” Matt smiles, looking down at you like you’re his baby.

Then…

12113213.content:
Your head was spinning due to all of the sudden changes going on, everyone was so much bigger than you were, and you didn't understand what was happening! Matt tried comforting you by patting you on the back, but feeling his hand, which was almost as big as your entire upper body pat your back didn't make you feel better. Just then you heard a knock on your door. You and Matt look up and you said, "What is it?" You heard someone outside say, "It's Jack and Josh, can we come in?" Your eyes widened when you heard the names, you two younger twin brothers! You had forgotten how big they must be now! You took a deep breath, looked over at your giant friend Matt, who thankfully hadn't gotten any bigger since you last looked at him and you said, "Come in."

Jack and Josh walked into your room and you looked up at them. Thankfully, they weren't bigger than Matt, but they were a lot bigger than you. They hadn't been big for their age before, but now they certainly seemed to be to you. They always talked about how awesome it would be to eventually be taller than you, so you were now dreading this moment. Jack and Josh smiled at you and Matt and Jack said, "What's up little bro? Can we play with you guys?" Josh nodded in agreement. Matt responded, "Sure, your brother is just feeling bad right now, we'll play with you guys later." Jack and Josh acknowledged and left the room . Matt looked at you and said, "Do you think a nap would help you feel better? I can go just chill with your brothers. You sighed and said, "Yeah, I think that would help, thanks. I don't think I'll be too long." Matt got up and left the room and you laid down in your bed. You just hoped that once you woke up from your nap that this all turned out to be one big nightmare. You just prayed that no one would turn out to be bigger when you woke up, especially Matt and your brothers.

What happened?

121132132.content:
When you awoke, everything still felt roughly the same, maybe you lost an inch or two, putting you at about 2 feet 5 inches tall. A cool breeze was felt through the window, as you hear the trees rustling in the wind. You scan your surroundings, seeing Matt dozing off on the sofa. Jumping off the bed, you groggily walked over to him, lightly tapping his shin. He stirred in his sleep and slowly woke up. Staring at you, he muttered "Hi Charlie! You feeling better already?"

'Sure, like one could ever feel better after being reduced to a state like this' you thought to yourself.

"Umm, yeah sorta." was what actually came out. Looking around you, a feeling of unfamiliarity filled you. The room felt so similar yet so different at the same time. At your current height, everything just looked so big.

From the bottom of the sofa, you stared at his legs, admiring their length as well as their strength. His muscles felt firm to the touch, as they were very well defined, even his calves were well shaped. A true testament to his sporting achievements. Your eyes wandering towards his feet next, which at your size looked so big and long. When you were normal sized, you were always proud of the fact that your size 16s dwarfed his size 12s. But now, your foot paled in comparison towards the larger appendage. They just seemed so appealing to you. Perhaps being so small compared to Matt had stirred something within you. Maybe you could do something with his feet?

"Where are my brothers?" you broke the awkward silence, wanting to know about your brothers' whereabouts as well.

"Oh after you slept they just went down to play some games. I stayed here the whole time."

You thanked him for it. You were feeling quite refreshed now, having just woken up. You were craving for something to do, despite your diminished stature. You had this pent up energy within you that was just dying to get out. You had already accepted how everybody except you were growing. You had always towered over your friends throughout your schooling years, might as well try being the short one in life for once, experience how it is like. Though the difference in height now was significantly greater. What did you want to do?

1213.content:
Matt finally walked you back home. You were so thrilled to have a big, tall, muscular, and athletic pal like him. He walked him from your place and promised you to meet up with you again after class the next day. What a great friend!

The following day, you got up extra early, you had breakfast and you showed and finally got dressed before you dashed out of the house and walked to school. Once you arrived on campus, everybody just seemed so… Tall! You were one of the shortest guys around, with almost all the guys and most of the girls towering over you.

Once you stepped inside of the main building, you couldn’t help but gawk at all the tall students surrounding you. You were walking around, looking all around you without looking where you were going when you suddenly bumped into someone’s backside. Of course, with so many people being taller than you, you suddenly noticed that you were staring at somebody’s breasts!

“Oh! I’m sorry! I wasn’t looking where I was going!” you stammer as you quickly take a step back, bumping into suddenly else behind you.

“Oh, who…? Oh, is that you, Charlie?” A tall, blonde girl said as she looked down at you. It was Jen!

Then, when you turned around, you noticed a few other tall girls who were quickly surrounding you. Every single one of them was at least three inches taller than you!

“Uhh… Sorry, Jen! I-I wasn’t looking…. You know, everybody’s so tall these days… I keep on bumping into people… I’m really sorry…” you state seriously.

“It’s okay, Charlie! In fact, you would make such an adorable addition to our squad! What do you think, girls?” Jen asked as the girls looked on. “He’s cute and short! We can lift him up and throw him in the air! He can stand on our shoulders! What do you think, girls?”

“Uhh… What? Who? Me? Be a cheerleader? Say what?” you stutter.

“Charlie! Meet us after class at the football practice field, okay! We’ll get you a nice, colorful uniform! We’ll put you in a t-shirt and sweats and see how you fit in on the cheerleading squad!” Jen grinned. “You’re exactly what we’ve been looking for!”

Your jaw drops wide open! You were just invited to join the cheerleading squad as the shortest guy on the team! What luck! You’re gonna work with tall, cute and sexy girls during all the football games! How about that?

The cheerleaders take turns taking a shower with you that night
Having fun in the backyard pool with the cheerleaders
The dream sleepover in a large bed with towering cheerleaders
Getting tossed around the back yard by the towering cheerleaders
12131.content:
So, you walk towards the male locker room heading towards the football field after the last period ends when you see Jen standing there, right by the entrance to the female locker room (which is next to the male locker room). Jen is sitting at a table containing several white boxes.

“Hey, Charlie! I’m so glad I got to see you before practice! Let’s see here, what size do you wear? I guess you wear Small or Medium, right? Let me see…” she says as she looks at the labels on each box before pulling out one box with labels “MALE SIZE SMALL CHEER”. “This should fit you perfectly! Go put this on and meet us out on the 50-yard line, champ!”

She hands you a white box as you walk into the male locker room. You set down the box inside the male locker room and on one of the wooden benches. Inside, you see a pair of bright red sweatpants and blue shirt with the team name ‘Wildcats’ spelled on it in big, yellow letters. You remove your school clothes and you put on the bright uniform. It fits you perfectly.

Once you walk outside, you wander over to the practice football field, where you spot a large group of tall, athletic girls who are all wearing the same style of uniform as you. The difference is that they’re all wearing skirts instead of sweatpants.

“Hi, Charlie! We’re so glad you made it!” Jen smiled, as she introduced you to Taylor, LaToya, Denise, Janice, Dawn, Mary, Cynthia and a few more. All these girls were much taller than you, and some of them, especially Taylor and Denise, were muscular as well as they had thick arms, bulging quads and big breasts.

“You don’t have to do much, Charlie. Just smile and wave a lot!” Taylor said. “We will hold you and pick you up now and then as you stand in front of us!

“Occasionally we might pick you up and toss you in the air!” Janice smiled.

“Uhh… Wait… What? Toss me in the air?” you stutter.

Then, the coach blew his whistle and all the girls lined up at the sideline, one next to the other. You were in the middle somewhere.

TWO, FOUR, SIX, EIGHT
WHO DO WE APPRECIATE?
CATS! CATS! GOOOOOOO WILDCATS!
W-I-L-D CATS!
W-I-L-D WILD-CATS!
W-I-L-D CATS!
UH! UH!
WE’RE WILD ABOUT THE CATS!

The girls continued to sing their team fight song, repeating their chorus over and over again, waving the pompoms together, until one of the girls grabbed you by the waist from behind and placed you on their shoulders.
W-I-L-D CATS!

Next thing you knew, you were tossed straight up into the air and then caught as you came falling straight down!
“Aaaaaaaahhh!”
UH UH
WILD ABOUT THE CATS!

Then, one of the girls just picked you up and HURLED you high into the air…. You soared across the area where the girls were standing until… You were caught by one of the other big cheerleaders!
“Ahh! Ooooooh!!!”
FIGHT FIGHT FIGHT TO VICTORY
W-I-L-D CATS!

Then, before you could say or do anything, you were picked up and tossed back to the same girl! Your body was tossed from one end of the group of cheerleaders to the other end!
GOOOOOOO WILDCATS!!!
“Whaaaaaaaaahhhh!”

Finally, after the cheering was over, somebody set you down as the cheerleaders all sat down on the bleachers. You were gasping, panting and sweating like crazy.

“Wasn’t that FUN, Charlie?” Jen said to you as she took her seat right next to you.

“Ohh, the little guy was wonderful! He is SO cute!” Taylor said.

“It’s so EASY to pick him up and toss him around! The little snuggle-bun!” Janice added.

“I just LOVE a little guy whom I can toss in the air like Charlie. I just wanna cuddle up with him tonight, like a little Teddy Bear!” Dawn giggled.

“GIRLS! Let’s have a sleepover at my house…. GIRLS ONLY…. And we invite Charlie over as well!” Jen shouted.

“Yeah! I wanna sleep with my big arms around the little cutie!” Cynthia laughed.

“Can you take it, Charlie? Spending the night in a house with nine cheerleaders?” Jen smiled. “With you being the smallest and ONLY guy?”

You can’t believe it. A sleepover with nine towering cheerleaders? You must be dreaming, right?

122.content:
"So Matt, what does it feel like being this tall now?"

"Well, I definitely feel much stronger, and I can definitely see more things haha! Now I know how it is like to see from your height! What do you say Charlie, wanna go eat something?" Matt asked.

You went to order 2 large pizzas, a pepperoni as well as a triple beef pizza, and shared it with Matt.

You and Matt both sat down at the dining room table, grabbing slices after slices of both pizzas. washing it down with milk while talking about the sudden growth spurt of Matt. "So, this is quite weird. How did you even grow by 5 inches in a blink of an eye?" "I don't know, I just suddenly had this feeling and tingle all throughout my body, and all of a sudden, I could feel my body lengthening." He said as he chewed on a slice of pizza. "But honestly, it feels very satisfying. I like the feeling of being taller. I can't wait for another growth spurt again. Who knows how big i'll be this time? I can already feel my clothes getting tighter already. I can't wait." You had also expressed interest in wanting to see Matt grow. You had always kept it within you that you had an interest towards giants, and seeing him already grow 5 inches in such a short time, you could felt excited about what was going to happen! Oh how big was he gonna be? Can't wait to see how this ends! You thought to yourself.

What happens next?

choices: Yes he grew again
No he didn't
1221.content:
In the midst of your thoughts, you felt something poking your knees as you and Matt were eating the pizza at the dinner table. "Matt! Why are your knees touching mine?"

"Huh what? I didn't move them, wait. Could I be growing again?"

You looked under the table, and you could see Matt's pants shortening. The pant legs were rising higher and, looking back up, you could see that his torso was lengthening as well.

"Ooo~ I'm growing again! I wonder how tall I'll be?" You told Matt to stand against the wall, and you took a tape measure. You could tell he is a fair bit taller than you, as you have to tilt your head up a bit to see his face. This felt foreign to you. It has been years since you had to look up to someone, save for a few moments when you do see someone taller than you. Now, your best friend is taller than you! You're gonna need some getting used to, though your all for it, as you always had an interest for giants.

You took a tape measure and pulled it till his head, it read 7 feet exact. You excitedly told Matt, who was equally as excited as you were. You could already see that his shirt was riding up his stomach quite a fair bit, and that the sleeves were tight to the point of tearing. His pants also displayed similar strain. "Oh yeah, I can't wait for my next growth spurt! By the way, do you have a measuring scale? I wanna weigh myself, see how much I've gained from this." You agreed with him and brought him to the bathroom.

The doorway was exactly 7 feet, so Matt's head was squarely touching the top of it. You both went in, and went over to the scale. He hopped onto the scale with both his feet. You noticed that Matt's feet were really big. They were long, veiny and powerful, the toes themselves were hanging off the scale already. Matt caught you gawking at his feet, and told you, "I used to wear size 16s, I wonder what size they are now? We can measure them after this." You nodded, and looked at the scale, trying not to focus too much on those feet, those big, long feet and toes. You snapped out of it and looked at the numbers, 285 pounds. If you recalled correctly when he was normal sized he was about 190 pounds. He is quite heavy now. "Wow 285, about 95 lbs increase. Nice. Could you help me measure my feet now?" You grabbed the Brannock device you had near the sink and placed it next to Matt. It could measure up to size 20. He placed his feet into it and, shockingly, it didn't fit! "Oh I'm loving this more and more now. My feet is too big for the Brannock device. My toes are like sticking out of this thing haha."

"Yeah, those long toes, those toes sure are damn long! I still got the tape measure, lemme take your size for you instead." You took the tape and measured it. It read about 16.5 inches, or basically size 24s! "Size freaking 24s, my feet sure are big! I love them." "Now that we're done with that, you wanna go play some ball?" you suggested. "Sure bro, anything! I'll have the advantage haha." Matt replied.

You both went to play basketball, did Matt grow again while playing?

12211.content:
You both went outside to play some basketball, usually you had the advantage over Matt being a couple of inches taller than him. Now, Matt had the clear advantage now being 7 feet tall. As you walked outside to play, you noticed that you came up to about Matt's shoulders, this was not going to be easy.

You took a couple of warm up shots and then started to play. Matt was dominating early, he even dunked over you a couple of times. Matt laughed after dunking one time and said, "Come on Charlie, don't make this too easy for me!" You finally managed to score once, but you needed to break Matt's ankles to do it. You laughed after and said, "How was that, I guess you still are getting used to how big you are!" Matt stayed on the ground for another minute, and you noticed something going on. Was he growing again. You stepped back to get a better perspective and it looked like he was.

You moved toward Matt to help him up. You help out your hand, and he grabbed it. As he stood up, you realized that you were definitely right, Matt had grown more. As he stood up, Matt continued to rise higher and higher above you.

Just how much taller did Matt grow?

Nah, lunch can wait, I wanna know my size now!
122111.content:
Standing now, Matt was 8 feet tall. He towered over you, your head to his shoulders. His clothes are all gone now, except for his tight boxers. You look at him, noting how much bigger he is to you. He was already buff when he was normal sized. But now, coupled with his height, made him look very big and very intimidating. His biceps were large, well defined pecs and you could see his toned 6 pack. His thighs were lean and you could see his clearly defined calf muscles. Standing face to face to his chest, you could see that he was wider than you were by quite a fair bit.

"Enjoying what you're seeing?" Matt asked. "Yeah. Absolutely stunning and huge." Standing in front of him, you carried on staring at his chest, slowly scanning upwards, your eyes meeting his. You see that Matt was now looking down at you by quite a fair bit. Similarly, you also had to tilt your head up near 90 degrees due to his bigger form and your closeness to him. You couldn't believe how he was towering over you now.

You both went in. After taking a shower, you both went up to your room and you got him the biggest set of clothes you could find. The shirt was tight fitting and was slightly short. The shorts were also tight on him. He asked for a pair of socks as well. Looking at his feet, you doubt he could fit in them, but you went to look for them as well. You walked over to your closet. It was built into the wall, essentially like a mini storage room in there. It had shelves with boxes in there for some of your clothing and stuff. You walked in, it was a small room. The ceiling of the room was as your height, so it was tight fitting. Just as you found the socks and about to walk out, Matt suddenly said, "I wanna come in as well."

"What no! You're too big, besides I got the socks already."

"I know, but it's precisely because I'm big that I wanna go in there. It makes me feel like a giant. I know you like that too Charlie, don't deny it."

"No I don't!" you said with embarrassment. It's true, you always liked giants. And now your best friend had become one, why not just embrace it?

"Whatever, I'm going in." Matt walked over to the entrance, blocking off the light. The doorway reached slightly below his shoulders. Bending down, he went in butt first. You moved as far in as you could, sitting down with your legs to your chest, though you could only go so far. This room was 3 and a half feet long and about 3 feet of available space after minusing the side shelves. Matt's body was slightly wider than the room, but that didn't stop him as well. He squeezed in bending down, his head tilted forward while he further squeezed himself in, until his back was up against your legs. He then tried to close the door, though his feet were so long now that his toes were slightly out of the room. He scrunched his toes up and closed the door.

"Wow this place sure is tiny huh Charlie."

You reached out for the light switch, turning it on. Luckily the light was fixed onto the back wall and not the top, else it would've been broken by Matt. You see how big he truly was now, his whole body blocked the front of the room and his head was bent forward, his neck touching the ceiling. You leaned your head against his back, and said, "Actually, this is quite comfortable."

"How long are you gonna stay in here?" you added.

"I dunno. Why don't we think of something first before going out."

"Sure."

Still leaning on his back, you thought if what to do next. Maybe you could help to measure Matt, you were sure that he would like to know how big he is now. Your thoughts were interrupted when you felt his back moving. You leaned back and saw that he was growing again! "Matt!! You're growing again!"

"I know."

"Dude this room's not gonna fit you any longer get out!"

"I don't know man, I'd say that there's still lots of space."

You started pounding on his back, hoping that he'd get out. But Matt was unmoving. His growth was taking up more and more of your space. The closet door opened as his toes could no longer fit within the room. You could see him getting wider as the shelves were pushing deeper into his flesh, when suddenly, you could hear cracking sounds. The shelves were being crushed by his form! They broke and your items fell to the floor. This gave Matt more space sideways, though he still didn't have enough space vertically. You saw your opportunity and crawled through the newly created space at the side. You could hear Matt moan as he enjoyed the growth seeping into his body. Making it out, you call out to him again, "Matt! Get out please the room is not going to fit you anymore! You're getting too big!"

"Fine." he said. He extended his legs out first, his feet reaching your knees. You could see that his back was pressing onto the ceiling, again, cracking sounds can be heard. "Hurry!" you called out to him. You helped pull his legs, while he wormed his way out.

Finally he was out, sitting on the floor of your room now. You went back in to assess the damage, the side shelves were completely demolished while the were some cracks in the ceiling. "What the heck Matt, look what you've done." you said in anger. That was when Matt stood up and walked to you. Before, you were at his shoulders. Now, you were below that, and eye level with his lower chest. You had to crane your neck all the way up just to maintain eye contact with him. Not gonna lie you were intimidated by his huge stature, but you were not gonna back down. What caught you off guard was what happened next. You'd expect him to threaten you with his size, but what he rather did was to light tackle you to the ground and say, "Come onnnn. You can't stay mad at your best friend and favourite giant can you. It was just a joke, I know you like me being so big and all compared to you, I just wanted to give you that!" while hugging you, his larger form wrapping yours up. Your tenseness and anger dissolved as he showed you his tender side. You did enjoy it, you know that, and Matt was the one to give you that enjoyment." Ugh fine. Just cause you're a giant now that's why I'm gonna forgive you"

"Awwww that's why I say you're my best friend!" he said, hugging you tighter. Your breath was squeezed out of your body. "Now, what do you want to do?" Charlie asked you.

"I want to help you measure your size, I estimate you have grown at least a foot now, making you at least 9 foot. And just now when you extended your legs out, they were so big, so I'm certain they're at least size 30 now. Maybe we could take your weight as well, though I doubt the scale can handle it."

Matt's stomach rumbled.

Factoring that in, you added, Or if you want we could go settle lunch first before doing the measurements. It's up to you."

12212.content:
You played for an hour and a half. During the game, you noticed that Matt was more awkward than usual. He's probably not used to his new height. You beat him pretty easily.
You both sat tired and sweaty in the garden. Matt looked ridiculously sweaty in his tight pants and shirt. He was barefoot because of the size of his feet.
"Dude, you defeated me well." He said appreciatively.
"Of course, you were incredibly slow and clumsy." You laugh.
"Okay, admit it. Still, my new size is weird. But when I get into it ..."
"I will win the same way." You cut Matt's word.
"Excluded. Or maybe." He admits.

"Yeah, that wouldn't hurt me." Matt gets one.
"It's unnecessary for you. You have no clothes here that will fit you. And as you leave the house, your feet will get dirty again." You point to the obvious.
Matt looks at himself puzzled and only realizes how ridiculous he looks.
"I NEED NEW CLOTHES. I can't go out with people like that. Everyone will laugh at me." He said.
In half an hour, you were already in your favorite clothing store. There was a lot more choice in your size than anywhere else. And here your size was one of the smallest. The shop only sold to people with large dimensions. Matt had been here before, but he only needed shoes from here. You could easily find size 17 shoes for yourself here, but you weren't sure if they were selling size 24.
The shopkeeper greets you kindly. Then she looks at Matt.
"I see you haven't bought from us in a long time." Then she started to pick up the phone.
You looked at Matt. He bought a new shoes from the same girl here a month ago. Yet she was not surprised at Matt's new height. Whatever. You started looking for new clothes.

1221222.content:
You both went for the movie. Avengers Endgame was just released and you two had been dying to watch it. You told Matt, "Hey Matt! Endgame is finally here!! Let's gooo!" You and Matt went to buy your tickets, choosing the back seat row and a large drink and popcorn before heading into the movie. You found your seats and sat down, enjoying the movie.

You were so engrossed in the movie. The action scenes and especially the final fight scene, you loved it. You turn to Matt, and see that he was visibly bigger. The full three hours of the movie had resulted in this huge growth. His legs were now so long that he had no choice but to put them through the seat gap of the front seat, luckily there wasn't anybody sitting there. Looking at his feet, the loose fitting size 26 shoes were now destroyed, way too small for his feet as the ball of his foot extended past the edge of the sole. He could very well be at least size 35 now. His toes were at least still covered by his socks though they were very tight. Looking at him, he fit very snugly into the cushioned seat. His head extended past the head rest, which was now supporting his shoulders.

"Dude you grew again, and by so much!"

"Huh! I knew I grew but I didn't know I grew this much." Standing up now, he was towering over you, his pecs jutted out from his chest towards your face.

"Matt I think you're getting a little too big. How bout we just head home?"

"
1221222.title: You went somewhere (eat, cinema, park, swimming...

choices: Take a bath and go to sleep.
To measure you.
12212221.content:
"Not yet." Matt said after some thought. "We still have to go get some food. There's not enough at home and this body needs a lot of food." He showed himself.
So you walked down the street and stopped at the first fast food restaurant. You went in and ordered.
"7 hamburgers 3 big french fries and 2 big shakes, please." Matt said.
"I want a soda and 2 hamburgers, please." You did it quickly.
After a few minutes, you received the food and sat down at a table after paying. Matt was very hungry because he ate 2 hamburgers in 3 minutes and didn't stop. You looked at your friend. On his short T-shirt and shorts and on the feet hanging from the cracked shoes under the table. It's hard to believe he was smaller than you in this morning. By the time you notice the burgers were in Matt's stomach and he was eating the fries. Two more minutes and nothing on his tray.
"I'm full." He said with satisfaction.
"You had a lot of free space." You say.
"It just was."
"Just order some to take away, too. Then I think we can go." You announce it.
"Yeah, I'd like to go home. You can't imagine how uncomfortable these cracked little shoes are."
You open the door at home. Matt leans over slowly and enters the house. He walked over to the couch and sat on it. Then he tried to remove the shoes from his feet, but whatever he tried, he failed.
"These things are too small. I can't get my feet out of them. What do I do now?" He asked you.
"I have an idea." You say, then you go out to the garage.
When you came back, you had a big clipper in your hand. You sat down on the coffee table opposite Matt and took one of his feet into your lap. On one side you slowly cut the shoes off. Now Matt could easily free his foot. You repeated this with his other foot as well.
"Thank you buddy." Matt thanks you.
"I think it's time ..."
12212221.title: Nah, I still wanna go somewhere

choices: When Andrew gets back, he looks a little... taller?
About 30 minutes later Andrew calls you to join him at the pools
After a while you're starting to get a faint sinking feeling
Something else happens
13.content:
You see Andrew descending the stairs. He is wearing his signature white t-shirt, grey sweatpants, white sport socks, and a duffel bag in his hand meaning that he is getting ready for his Saturday morning swimming session. He's got feet that are a bit big for someone his height. They kind of were always like this and he was often the butt of all the bigfoot and swimming jokes in the elementary school. However, when he began frequenting the pools and started to swim for real, it turned out that he had a natural talent for swimming! Now swimming is his way of keeping himself in shape and over the years he had developed an ideal swimmer's body, and he put it to good use: just last month he brought home a gold medal from the national swimming competition!

"Hey." You greet him.

"Hey, Charlie." He greets you back as he takes a bowl for himself and sits at the kitchen table across from you to have a breakfast. Funny enough, although when you two were younger, there was some sibling rivalry between you two, but as you he entered high school and got his own room, you kind of grew out of it and are on relatively good terms since you both follow different passions and play different sports and are therefore never in each other's way.

"Swimming again, huh?" You strike up a conversation to avoid that awkward eating in silence.

"Oh, yeah. I like going in the morning during weekends. Barely any people. I can swim as much as I like." He grins and stretches his muscular arms with a groan.

"With how much time you spend in the water, I'm surprised you haven't got gills yet."

He actually chuckles at your jab. "There we go, another fish joke." He shakes his head, still smiling. "I heard them all. Next time, try otters. Or seals."

With that he stands up, leaves his empty bowl in the sink (wow, he was fast!), and heads for the door with his trusty bag. He puts on his size 16 Nikes and leaves with his bike for the city pools.
You, on the other hand finish your cereal in peace and quiet. Your parents are away for a week, starting this weekend, and you are going to make full use of this weekend to kick back and relax. You clean up the mess on the table, wash the dishes and happily sit down on the couch on front of the TV. As a near adult, you don't mind having an entire house to yourself.
13.title: Andrew (your older brother)

choices: tell him that he has grown taller.
offer to rub his big feet.
just watch the TV with him, but keep an eye out.
131.content:
There is nothing like having the couch and the TV all to yourself. It feels good to just sit back and relax, but time flies when you're having fun. Just as you are refilling your glass with soda in the kitchen you hear the front door open and Andrew walks in.

"Had fun?" You ask him as you make you way back into the living room.

"Man, I don't know." He looks a bit distraught as he drops his bag on the floor. "It was all good, but my feet are killing me!"

He passes you by, making a beeline for the couch. As he does, you notice that he is the same height as you. That's impossible. You were taller than him since you were 12. He is 6'3", he should be eye level with your mouth. Very strange. He plops down on the couch and kicks the Nikes off. He lets out an audible sigh of relief and wiggles his long socked toes. Now that you look at him, there are no more creases in his shirt and pants and the discarded sneakers lying next to his flexing feet do look a size or two too small. It can't be. No one grows this much in just a couple of hours. He doesn't seem to have noticed and just watches the TV.

You sit down next to him and...
131.title: Andrew looks a bit different...

choices: Andrew is 2 inches taller again. (He doesn't notice.)
Andrew hasn't changed yet.
Andrew grew 4 inches.
1313.content:
You just watch TV with your brother but sometimes you secretly look at him. He doesn’t seem to have noticed the growth spurt. His clothes are a little tight now but nothing else happened to him. If he hadn't stopped in front of you, you wouldn't have noticed the change either. His feet also looked bigger just next to his shoes. Now it’s barely noticeable in the well-expanding socks.
When the movie is over, Andrew goes out to the kitchen. You're wondering what could have caused your brother to grow. But you can't figure them out.
For the rest of the day, nothing unusual happens. After dinner, all four of you are sitting on the couch in your pajamas. Your parents are not coming home tonight. The twins don't even notice that Andrew is taller now. An hour later, you went to bed.
The next morning you wake up last. By the time you get to the kitchen, your siblings have had breakfast. Andrew is just trying to stuff his oversized foot into his shoes.
"Are you leaving?" You ask him with a full mouth.
"Yeah. I'm not going to get it tomorrow because of my driving test so I'm going to swim today." He said. "I have to go three times a week if I want to stay in shape."
You watch him struggle to put on his shoes.
"It's going to be really hot today. Wear sandals." You recommend it to him.
"You're right." He agrees with you and folds his shoes into the corner.
"Boys didn't you come?" He shouts at the twins.
"We're not in the mood now. Next time." Jack shouted back.
After Andrew is gone and you have finished your breakfast you will get dressed. You'll be busy for five hours when Andrew comes home
1313.title: just watch the TV with him, but keep an eye out.

choices: You offer to rub his feet.
You tell him about growth.
13131.content:
Andrew opened the door and enters the house. His bag hangs over his shoulder and he holds his sandals in one hand. He wipes his bare feet on the doormat. He drops the sandals on the floor and you see that one of the straps is torn. As Andrew steps in and you see the sandals next to his feet and he looks 3 or 4 sizes smaller.
"This crap was torn off when I wanted to get up. So I had to come home barefoot. Although I spent most of my time on the bike." He says as he takes his bag off his shoulder and starts taking the wet stuff out of it that he will unload it to dry.
Then you step closer to him and see that he is taller than you now. You're completely confused. How did he get taller again? Will he still grow? Doesn't that hurt him?
Although at least Andrew is not only your older brother but also your bigger one now. "It must be funny to watch him try to find shoes for his new huge feet." You think to yourself as you look down at his feet again.
Andrew sits down on the couch and starts squeezing one of his feet.
13131.title: Andrew is 2 inches taller again. (He doesn'...

choices: You remain at his side, watch if he grows or not
You go check on your twin brothers real quick
131311.content:
Andrew sucks in a breath as he squeezes his foot. The serious look on his face is very unlike him and has you worried for your brother's well-being.
"You alright?" you ask him as you sit next to him on the couch. He takes a glance at you but his focus is quickly back on his aching foot.
"Yeah, nothing to worry about. It's just those cheap shoes and now the sandals." he commented "Next time I'm buying myself the real stuff."

This is all fine, but you can't just sit here and watch your big bro struggle with the pain, knowing what the past two days have dealt him. Besides, offering him your help is the least you can do in these trying times.
"You know..." you begin your diplomacy "I could help." He chuckles.
"How? By rubbing my feet?"

Wait, how did he know? Oh wait... He's joking. Of course. Typical Andy.
"Yes, actually." You answer straight and true. His smile, gone within a second. He looks at you as if you just grew horns or something.
"You're for real?" He bursts out laughing. "You want to touch my big smelly feet?" He keeps on laughing and shakes his head, focusing back on trying to alleviate the pain in his aching foot.
"I will rub your feet if it helps-" You are interrupted by the foot landing in your lap. You nearly gasp, part out of shock, part out of surprise. Your brother's foot is not big. It is massive, and has proportional weight to it too! And now the other one joins its side. They are so heavy, and so close, attached to Andrew's muscular legs. "I... uhh"
"What's the matter? Lil' bro scared of feet?" Andrew teases you, "Or are these 'flippers' too much for you to handle?" He wiggles his long toes at you, the devil.

He is sitting on the opposite end of the couch, arms folded, grinning from ear to ear watching his brother in his predicament. Little does he know how long you wanted this to happen, and now is your chance to prove yourself, and to treat yourself to some beautiful athletic stompers.
You grab one of his feet with both hands, because it is so big, and dig your thumbs just under the ball. Andrew lets out a barely audible moan and lies back, flexing his toes.
"Oh, you're good with this... Keep up, don't stop now bro." Yes! He gave you the green light!

You are doing your best to prove your mettle, and enjoy it too. From the smooth, round heel, to the bulbous tips of his toes you massage his soles as if you are using some kind of magic. Never have you seen such big and beautiful feet, much less had a chance to knead, rub, and massage them with your very own hands, and you were doing a very good job because, if you didn't know better, you could say that Andrew is practically melting by the touch of your skilled hand, or perhaps he just needed a foot rub this badly. Whatever the case, by the time you are finished, you notice loud snoring from the other end of the couch and, yes, you see Andrew fast asleep, with his huge feet still in your hands, still resting in your lap.

And now...
131311.title: You offer to rub his feet.

choices: Wake him up and measure him
Call your twin brothers in
1313111.content:
You continued to rub his feet, taking note of its huge size in your small hands. After awhile more, you wanted to stand up, his feet was starting to become too heavy for your lap to carry. Your legs were starting to become numb. You struggled to lift both his feet off your lap, moving them one by one with both hands due to their huge size. Freeing yourself, you look at your brother sleeping like a log on the couch. Everytime after he comes back from swimming, he would always be exhausted. Not to mention how his feet must've been cramped into his small feet. You'd expect him to sleep for at least the next 2 hours, as he always does after swimming.

You were captivated by his huge feet, and thus went over to them. You wanted to see how much they have actually grown since before. He used to have size 16 feet, compared to your size 14 feet. Putting your feet just inches away from his so as to not wake him up, your eyes widened as the size difference has now increased clearly. Back then, your feet reached up to the middle of his big toe. Now, your toes only reached slightly higher than where his big toe started! And that wasn't all! His feet were also so much wider than yours. You could see the rest of his wide soles beside your foot, accentuating the difference in size. In fact it was so wide that the width of your five toes were only as wide as his last to second toe! You were truly amazed at his newer size. Looking at his pants, the hems were riding up his legs more than normal. You were wondering how and when he grew. So, as he slept on the couch with his feet in front of you, you waited for something to happen. Not gonna lie, staring at someone sleeping is not the most interesting thing in the world, so you soon fell asleep as well... Zzz...

15 minutes later, you were awoken by something touching your shins. Shaking off the drowsiness, you were astonished to see that your brother's feet were touching your shins and were still continuing to grow! You look at his pants which were getting increasingly shorter! He was still snuggling comfortably in the couch, clearly ignorant to his growing self. You were in wonder, seeing your brother grow even taller than you are. His shirt showing signs of strain as his torso grew larger. It was then when his growth slowed to a grinding halt. Lasted for about a minute or so. Looking at him now, you could see his feet were bigger than before, and that he definitely seemed bigger, he probably grew a foot or two. As he turned slightly on the couch, you could hear the springs groaning supporting the new load. This new size captivated your interest. You were seriously curious on his new size. How tall was he, how big was his feet, how heavy did he weigh now? Could the scale even handle his weight? Questions popped in and out of your head. Maybe you should wake him up to "help" measure his new size? Or perhaps you should call your other brothers in about this.

1421.content:
Dash was stopping to get a hotdog on his way home from school, he wasn't wearing his costume but you knew it was him..you'd seen the movies after all!

"Hey! Hey!" You called out in a practical euphoric state of fanboy joy. Looking up with a bite of hotdog being chewed in his young cheeks, Dash stared at you and swallowed the chunks of hotdog. "Uh...yeah?"

You had the biggest goofiest grin on your face as you stood there before the younger boy as he looked off to the side awkwardly.

"Uhhhm...well I gotta go now-" Dash started to say..until you practically dove at him as he was walking away. "Wait! Lemme get your autograph!" You yelped.

"Huh? W-what are you talking about?" Dash pretended not to know why on earth you'd want his autograph...but he was clearly nervous since his identity was supposed to be secret!

Pulling a pen and paper out, you felt a strange energy emit from it and saw an orb of light go directly into the hotdog Dash was holding.

Dash seemed oblivious to this fact as he finished the food item off and tossed the wrapper over his shoulder. "Well..seeyagh!" He said through a mouthful and took off.

info.description:
Real life Characters:

You: Charlie
Age:17
Normal Height: 6'5"

Older Brother: Andrew
Age: 18
Normal Height: 6'3"

Younger Twin Brothers: Jack and Josh
Age: 11
Normal Heights: 5'1"

Best Friend: Matt
Age: 17
Normal Height: 6'0"

Other characters can be added whenever you want!

Now includes a cartoon character, or any fictional character story line! Feel free to add any fictional character you want! Please try and follow rules.

Synopsis:
You have a strange dream one night that the universe and all who inhabit it seem to grow, except you. You wake up the next morning and discover your dream has become true! Your family and friends begin to grow and grow while you stay at your normal size. You must discover why this is happening!

Please Add! Will give gift points for additions!

The story has over 3,500 views! Thank you for reading! I would like to send a special shout out to those who have added to this story! It means a lot, thank you! I hope to see more additions; remember, gift points will be given if you add.

Rules:
1) I'll allow female giants, but more focus on male giants please
2) Do not kill main character
3) No one sentence chapters, unless necessary. No gift points will be given for these!
4) No Size Limit, let everything and everyone grow as big as you want!
5) Do not end the story!
6) Can have only one person growing if you want, doesn't have to be everyone.
Other than that, have fun!

Enjoy the story and please add!

*If you want to message me about possible chapter ideas thats alright too!
